sub_title: Regional Head of Communications, PR and Influence for Central Europe
summary: I am a strategic communications, PR and influencer marketing specialist with over 10 years of experience in the global fashion industry. I have strong omnichannel marketing knowledge and project management skills, with hands-on experience in both the creative and commercial sides of fashion communications and influencer marketing. My experience in the fashion sector has given me a great work ethic, preparing me to be a candid problem solver and team-player with strong communication skills. Throughout my career I’ve had the privilege of collaborating with many creative and diverse stakeholders worldwide, which has made me a skilled negotiator who’s able to work across different cultures and disciplines simultaneously.
